label: specifiedIdentity
comment: A proprietary Identity specified for this person.
A proprietary identity specified for this creditor financial institution.
A proprietary identity specified for this requesting party.
A proprietary identity specified for this trade party.
An employer identity specified for this contact person.
The financial identity specified for this trade party.
The person identity specified for this contact person.

rangeIncludes.comment: Proprietary information which uniquely identifies a person or organization.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
